verses.verse: Then he <S%H7121>cried<s%> in my <S%H241>ears<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Cause those who are in <S%H6486>charge<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> to draw <S%H7126>near,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> with his <S%H4892>destroying<s%> <S%H3627>weapon<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

<S%H8337>Behold,<s%> six <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5945>upper<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> which <S%H6437>lies<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> with his <S%H4660>slaughter<s%> <S%H3627>weapon<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> in their <S%H8432>midst<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen,<s%> with a <S%H5608>writer<s%>'s <S%H7083>inkhorn<s%> by his <S%H4975>side.<s%> They went <S%H935>in,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

The <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was gone <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H3742>cherub,<s%> whereupon it <S%H4670>was,<s%> to the threshold of the <S%H1004>house:<s%> and he <S%H7121>called<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen,<s%> who had the <S%H5608>writer<s%>'s <S%H7083>inkhorn<s%> by his <S%H4975>side.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5674>him,<s%> Go through the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> through the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H8427>set<s%> a <S%H8420>mark<s%> on the <S%H4696>foreheads<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H584>sigh<s%> and that <S%H602>cry<s%> over all the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> that are <S%H6213>done<s%> in its <S%H8432>midst.<s%>

To the <S%H428>others<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%> in my <S%H241>hearing,<s%> <S%H5674>Go<s%> through the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5221>him,<s%> and strike: <S%H5869>don't<s%> let your eye <S%H2347>spare,<s%> neither have <S%H2550>pity;<s%>

<S%H2026>kill<s%> <S%H4889>utterly<s%> the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H970>man,<s%> the young man and the <S%H1330>virgin,<s%> and little <S%H2945>children<s%> and <S%H802>women;<s%> but <S%H5066>don't<s%> come near any <S%H376>man<s%> on whom is the <S%H8420>mark:<s%> and <S%H2490>begin<s%> at my <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%> Then they <S%H2490>began<s%> at the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> that were <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2930>them,<s%> Defile the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H2691>courts<s%> with the <S%H2491>slain.<s%> Go <S%H3318>forth!<s%> They went <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> in the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

It <S%H5221>happened,<s%> while they were smiting, and I was <S%H7604>left,<s%> that I <S%H5307>fell<s%> on my <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H2199>cried,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H162>Ah<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh!<s%> will you <S%H7843>destroy<s%> all the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in your pouring <S%H8210>out<s%> of your <S%H2534>wrath<s%> on <S%H3389>Jerusalem?<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5771>me,<s%> The iniquity of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H1419>great,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H4297>perversion:<s%> for they <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>doesn't<s%> see.
As for me <S%H5869>also,<s%> my eye shall not <S%H2347>spare,<s%> neither will I have <S%H2550>pity,<s%> but I will <S%H5414>bring<s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%> on their <S%H7218>head.<s%>

<S%H376>Behold,<s%> the man <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen,<s%> who had the <S%H7083>inkhorn<s%> by his <S%H4975>side,<s%> <S%H7725>reported<s%> the <S%H1697>matter,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> as you have commanded <S%H6680>me.<s%>
